subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Miami held an 89-86 advantage with just over 5 minutes to play, but the Pacers, led by center Roy Hibbert, went on an 8-0 tear and never trailed again, evening the series at 2-2.
snippet: Miami held an 89-86 advantage with just over 5 minutes to play, but the Pacers, led by center Roy Hibbert, went on an 8-0 tear and never trailed again, evening the series at 2-2.
